body.p:
jManage is a evolving open source the jmanage community to easily add support for more products which they might want but is not yet supported. We request you contribute any such enhancements back to jManage and help it to become more useful.
List of current support include-

section.title: Application Servers
section.p:
- JBoss
- Bea Weblogic
- IBM WebSphere
- JDK1.5
- Tomcat
- MX4J
- JMX Remoting (JSR 160)
- Open Cloud Rhino
- Apache Geronimo

section.title: Connectors
section.p:
- Primitive Oracle connector
- Basic SNMP connector
